participant_1.name: Arjun
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Arjun loves to explore new ideas and lifestyles, often challenging traditional norms.
participant_1.background: i am a swim coach at my local pool. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india. my favorite music genre is death metal. i am studying to be a computer programmer.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Energetic and determined, Samantha maintains an active lifestyle, always looking for new fitness challenges.
participant_2.background: two dogs live with me. i've short hair. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i go to the gym regularly.

content.text: Me two I HV one dog
